post:
COIN.HOST has been providing privacy-infused web hosting service since 2011. As of today we are proud to server more than 20,000 businesses and individual clients from all around the globe. We offer some 70+ web hosting plans for any task and budget ranging from VPS to high performance clustered bare metal servers and accept Bitcoin alongside with hundreds of altccoins.

Why COIN.HOST?

free & instant virtual server deployment - get access to your VPS as soon as your payment is cleared
VMware HA hypervisor, which is considered one of the most advanced HV soltuions on the market
all-flash mirrored SSD array - self healing storage with industry-leading IOPS speed
SLA assured 99.9% availability and maximum service reliability
free DDoS protection for all VPS orders - forget about annoying script kiddies
ultra-fast 10 Gbps networking and direct connection to SwissIX for lowest latency possible
free DNS hosting - point your domains to your VPS right away
VPS snapshots & backup solutions - never lose a bit of your data again
highest privacy and data security in accordance to Swiss laws and industry regulations

View all VPS plans here: https://coin.host/vps-hosting-bitcoin

Server & company location
COIN.HOST operates exclusively from Switzerland, our data processing facility is located in Zurich.

Data Protection
Switzerland is renowned for its strict laws and regulations on privacy and data protection, there's hardly any other country in the world with a matching grade of privacy protection at the political level. Not only your data and privacy are protected by Swiss laws, but we also take weighty efforts to secure it at the infrastructure level. Our data center in Zürich is practically a fortress: 24x7 CCTV surveillance, perimeter and inner premises security patrols, multi-layered access barriers, including mantraps and bio-metric readers.

Have any questions?
Our dedicated support team is ready to answer your questions and provide all the assistance you may need 24/7/365 LIVE.

Bitcoin & hundreds of other cryptocurrencies accepted
COIN.HOST accepts Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Bitcoin SV, Bitcoin (Lightning Network), Ethereum, Litecoin, Nextcoin, Dash, ZCash, Monero, PIVX, NEO, Dogecoin and hundreds of other coins.
